server_configuration.name: ES_API_KEY
server_configuration.description: Your Elasticsearch API key with appropriate permissions

tools.name: list_indices
tools.description: Retrieve and display all available Elasticsearch indices to manage and interact with data stored in Elasticsearch through the MCP server.

tools.name: get_mappings
tools.description: Retrieve field mappings for a specified Elasticsearch index to understand its structure and data organization within the Elasticsearch MCP Server.
tools.instructions: Get field mappings for a specific Elasticsearch index
tools.jsonSchema: { "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#", "additionalProperties": false, "properties": { "index": { "description": "Name of the Elasticsearch index to get mappings for", "minLength": 1, "type": "string" } }, "required": [ "index" ], "type": "object" }

tools.name: search
tools.description: Query Elasticsearch indices using query DSL with enabled highlights. Connect and interact with Elasticsearch data via the Elasticsearch MCP Server for precise search results.
tools.instructions: Perform an Elasticsearch search with the provided query DSL. Highlights are always enabled.
tools.jsonSchema: { "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#", "additionalProperties": false, "properties": { "index": { "description": "Name of the Elasticsearch index to search", "minLength": 1, "type": "string" }, "queryBody": { "additionalProperties": {}, "description": "Complete Elasticsearch query DSL object that can include query, size, from, sort, etc.", "type": "object" } }, "required": [ "index", "queryBody" ], "type": "object" }
